tool.name: Moon Poster
tool.command: ln -s $new_vcf ${sample_name}.vcf && ln -s $cnv_vcf cnv_vcf.vcf && #if $repost.is_repost: ln -s $__tool_directory__/moon_api.py moon_api.py && $__tool_directory__/mito_merge.sh $repost.moon_id ${sample_name}.vcf cnv_vcf.vcf $user $token > $log #else: python $__tool_directory__/moon_api.py -snp ${sample_name}.vcf -cnv cnv_vcf.vcf -mode post -gender $repost.gender -user $user -token $token> $log #end if

param.name: sample_name
param.label: New Sample Name
param.help: Name for the new sample in Moon. Example 15-5380-WM

param.name: moon_id
param.label: Current Moon ID
param.help: To find the Moon ID go to the Moon page for the sample in question and look in the url. example: https://oregon.moon.diploid.com/samples/7079/analysis the Moon ID is 7079.
